CustomField.description: If set to true, the Role pick list field is hidden from the Assign Resource(s) to Project page. If set to false, existing behavior continues. It will work only when "Role Required on Creation" checkbox is set to false
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If set to true, the Role pick list field is hidden from the Assign Resource(s) to Project page. If set to false, existing behavior continues.It will work only when "Role Required on Creation" checkbox is set to false
CustomField.label: Role Hidden
